entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Valemount
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
